bike.description: C-4 carbon w/ Integrated head tube w/1 1/2" lower, Standard round 34.9mm seat tube, Internal cable routing, Oversized PIIS BB shell, Double water bottle mounts.. Rear triangle: C-4 carbon thin seat stays, Oversized chain stay and forged Alloy drop out w/replaceable hanger

Shimano Ultegra STI shifter/brake combo,  20-speed Flight Deck compatible
Oval W-745 Carbon/Alloy Clincher Wheelset, 45mm rim-700c, Sealed bearings
Vittoria Rubino Pro II, 700x23c, Kevlar Bead-Folding
Oval RB-700 Forged Alloy Dual Pivot w/Cartridge Pads
FSA No. 42 1 1/8"U - 1 1/2"L Integrated w/Alloy Top Cover
Oval RW-700 Customer Compact DB Alloy, 31.8mm
